docs.snippet: Fourteen states filed suit on Thursday accusing the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency of failing to issue regulations for curbing emissions of methane, a potent greenhouse pollutant, from existing oil and gas operations as required under the Cl...

headline.main: EPA Sued by 14 States Over Delay in Methane Emission Standards
headline.print_headline: EPA Sued by 14 States Over Delay in Methane Emission Standards

docs.snippet: An influential U.S. senator pressed for fair elections and the release of a jailed American during his private meeting with Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro, the senator said Saturday before departing the turbulent country.

headline.main: US Senator Meets With Venezuelan President, Jailed Utah Man
headline.print_headline: US Senator Meets With Venezuelan President, Jailed Utah Man

docs.snippet: China will struggle to replace U.S. soybean supplies after implementing an additional 25 percent tariff on American shipments, likely inflicting severe financial pain on domestic companies, analysts and executives at feedmakers said.

headline.main: China Deploys Soybeans in Trade War, but May Hit Own Foot
headline.print_headline: China Deploys Soybeans in Trade War, but May Hit Own Foot

docs.snippet: An attack on a shared data network forced four natural-gas pipeline operators to temporarily shut down computer communications with customers.

headline.main: Cyberattack Shows Vulnerability of Gas Pipeline Network
headline.print_headline: Gas Pipeline Vulnerability Is Exposed By Hackers

docs.snippet: Facebook Inc backed for the first time on Friday proposed legislation requiring social media sites to disclose the identities of buyers of online political campaign ads and introduced a new verification process for people buying "issue" ads, which...

headline.main: Facebook Backs Political Ad Bill, Sets Limits on 'Issue Ads'
headline.print_headline: Facebook Backs Political Ad Bill, Sets Limits on 'Issue Ads'

docs.snippet: The House speaker, Paul D. Ryan, still projects power, but back home in Wisconsin, he is facing political challengers from both the right and the left.

headline.main: Can Paul Ryan Be Defeated? Maybe Not, but His Race Is ‘a Circus’
headline.print_headline: Can Ryan Be Defeated? Maybe Not, but His Race Is ‘a Circus’

docs.snippet: They have a particular relevance for the Trump era.
Trump administration officials proposed raising the car entrance fee for its most popular national parks to $70. They received 109,000 comments, many critical.

headline.main: National Park Service Reconsiders Steep Fee Increase After Backlash
headline.print_headline: National Park Service Reconsiders Steep Fee Increase After Backlash

docs.snippet: Pakistan's prime minister arrived in Afghanistan on Friday for a day-long visit many see as an effort to ease strained relations between the two neighbors and revive a push for peace talks with the Taliban.

headline.main: Pakistani Prime Minister in Afghanistan to Ease Tensions
headline.print_headline: Pakistani Prime Minister in Afghanistan to Ease Tensions
